title: Sony Black Wireless Bluetooth Speaker SRSZR5 - Overview
description:
Sony Black Wireless Bluetooth Speaker  - SRSZR5 http://www.abt.com/product/98705/Sony-Black-Wireless-Bluetooth-Speaker-SRSZR5.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=SRSZR5_20160622

Get the sound you want at home with this versatile wireless speaker. One-touch Bluetooth connectivity helps you easily access all your music and the HDMI input lets you play audio from your TV. Combine with additional speakers for multi-room streaming rich surround sound and powerful rear stereo sound.
Features:
• Easy Bluetooth connectivity with One-touch NFC
• SongPal™ mobile app for easy control and multi-speaker music playback
• HDMI (ARC) connection to TV
• Stream music easily with Google Cast™ 1 and Spotify Connect
• Two-way speakers and dual passive radiators for immersive sound
